form 'factorlink' to INIGET

Email errors to log file

-- Send produced CSV-File to client per email
Email errors to log file

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('BCM023A: Limits and balance debtor level')
MlsTrans ('BCM023B: Limits and balance client level')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
Select INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALH from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN, :1/DEBH where INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_ADMNO = ADMN_NO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_COUNTCREDITLIMITS = 'Y' and INVO_CLNTNO <> 99999 and INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_DEBH_NO = DEBH_NO and DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = 0
UNION
Select DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALH from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN, :1/DEBH where INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_ADMNO = ADMN_NO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_COUNTCREDITLIMITS = 'Y' and INVO_CLNTNO <> 99999 and INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_DEBH_NO = DEBH_NO and DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH > 0
UNION
select distinct DEBH_NO, DATE('1901-01-01'), (select cast( sum(A.DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBC A where A.DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO) from :1/DEBH inner join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_CLNTNO <> 99999 and DEBC_ADMNO = :2 where DEBC_CREDITLIMITH<>0 and (DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = 0 or DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = DEBH_NO) order by 1, 2 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows;

Text.val: Direct sql UNION of
INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALH (legal owner = 0)
DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALH (legal owner <> 0)
DEBH_NO, '1901-01-01', DEBH_TOTACREDITLIMSUPPLIED (L.O = 0 or L.O = DEBH_NO)
Note: select of '1901-01-01' from DEBH because UNION requires matching columns
(I would have used NULL but couldn't get DB2/400 to select it)
Link debtor for adress info
Aging Totals
Reset totals
Output file

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_CLCURR, DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH, DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH, DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCH, DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCH from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB, :1/DEBH where DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = 0 and (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT <> 0 or DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 or DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING<>0) UNION select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, max(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT), max(DEBC_CLCURR), cast( sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast( sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast( sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast( sum(DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast( sum(DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB, :1/DEBH where DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH > 0 and (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT <> 0 or DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 or DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING<>0) group by DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH order by 1, 2, 3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: Totals per debtor calculated by direct sql UNION of:
DEBC/DEBH/DEBB of debtors without legal owner and
DEBC/DEBH/sum(DEBB) (CL as max) for debtors with legal owner
Totals/recaclulations Debtor
Totals on client level
Sql limit may be null, in this case recalculate as 0, zero fill eliminates diff.
recalculate if limit > 0 and currency <> gnrl
Calculate totals per client
